name: The House of Da Vinci Bundle
name_original: The House of Da Vinci Bundle
description:
The House of Da Vinci Bundle includes: The House of Da Vinci - Enter The House of Da Vinci, a new must-try 3D puzzle adventure game. Solve mechanical puzzles, discover hidden objects, escape from rooms and dive into the authentic atmosphere of the Renaissance. Use all your wits to find out what's behind your master's disappearance. The House of Da Vinci 2 - Become an apprentice of the famous Leonardo da Vinci. Solve handcrafted mechanical 3D puzzles and discover hidden secrets. Navigate through mesmerizing environments of the Italian Renaissance. Travel through time to influence your surroundings.

System requirements, bonus goodies, and features may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
